abstract: Objective We propose a nonparametric figure of merit, the contrast equivalent distance CED, to measure contrast directly from clinical images. Approach A relative brightness distance δ is calculated by making use of the order statistic of the pixel …

abstract: Image analysis can play an important role in supporting histopathological diagnoses of lung cancer, with deep learning methods already achieving remarkable results. However, due to the large scale of whole-slide images (WSIs), creating manual pixel …
